abstract: Marko Marin (Serbian Cyrillic: Марко Марин; born 13 March 1989) is a German footballer who plays for Sevilla FC in La Liga, on loan from Chelsea, as an attacking midfielder.Marin previously played for Bundesliga clubs Borussia Mönchengladbach and Werder Bremen. He is known for his acceleration, dribbling, agility, creativity, versatility, technical ability and as an assist-maker. A full German international since 2008, he represented the country at the 2010 World Cup.
